pullRequest.title: Test DLS and FLS against runtime fields
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR introduces integration tests for Document level security with queries against runtime fields, as well as field level security used in combination with runtime fields.
Relates to #59332

commit.message: Test DLS and FLS against runtime fields

nodes.bodyText: I don't think we need to wait_for a refresh, we can just do true, I think.
